task.title: View Mass Update Details
task.shortdesc: The Add Mass Updates page lists all updates submitted, including details such as the type of updates, status, name of individual who submitted the update, and the effective date.

step.cmd: From the Add Mass Updates page, select the Date Created link to view all details.
Review the transactions with a status of Completed with Errors or Changes Failed.

ul.li: Completed with Errors status indicates that some record updates passed, and some records failed.
Changes Failed status indicates all record updates failed.
Completed status indicates all record updates passed.
Contingent status indicates a future dated transaction is pending.

step.cmd: Apply updates to individual employee records for employees that failed to update.
